name: L'oreal Men Anti-Irritation Shave Gel 200Ml
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Preparation_and_Usage>How to use:Wet your face with warm water. Squeeze the gel onto the tips of your fingers and spread it over the area to shave. Massage until the gel transforms into a mousse. In case of contact with eyes, rinse them immediately.</Preparation_and_Usage></Cooking_Instructions>
ingredients: Mentha Piperita Extract / Peppermint Leaf Extract
Please check back of pack for up to date ingredients
PromotionDescription: Save 50p on any Nivea Men Sensitive skincare product Includes new Nivea Sensitive Cooling range
